Our Services

Comprehensive cleaning solutions tailored to your specific needs and budget. From residential to commercial, we have the expertise to handle any project.

üè†

Residential Cleaning

Our residential cleaning service covers every corner of your home with meticulous attention to detail. Whether it's a one-time deep clean after renovation, regular maintenance to keep your space pristine, move-in/out cleaning for new properties, post-party cleanup, or seasonal spring cleaning - we handle it all professionally. We understand your home is your sanctuary, and we treat it with the respect and care it deserves. Our team uses eco-friendly products that are safe for your family and pets.

From KES 5,000
üè¢

Commercial Cleaning

A clean office directly boosts employee productivity and leaves a lasting positive impression on clients and visitors. Our commercial cleaning specialists handle everything from daily maintenance schedules to special deep cleaning projects. We understand the unique demands of commercial spaces - minimal disruption during work hours, attention to detail in common areas, and comprehensive cleaning that maintains your professional image. We use hospital-grade disinfectants and efficient methods to keep your workspace pristine.

From KES 15,000
‚ú®

Specialized Services

Some cleaning jobs require specialized knowledge, equipment, and techniques. We're equipped to handle everything from delicate upholstery to stubborn carpet stains, sofa cleaning, mattress sanitization, and deep appliance cleaning. Our specialized team has undergone additional training to handle unique challenges professionally. Whether you need carpet restoration after water damage, upholstery cleaning for furniture maintenance, or complete appliance sanitation, we bring expertise and specialized equipment to deliver exceptional results.

Custom quote
üìÖ

Maintenance Plans

Never worry about cleaning again with our flexible maintenance plans designed for your specific needs and budget. Whether you prefer weekly, bi-weekly, or monthly cleaning schedules, we customize plans that fit your lifestyle perfectly. Our maintenance plans offer significant savings compared to one-time services, ensure consistent cleanliness, provide priority scheduling, and come with dedicated team assignments. These plans are perfect for busy professionals, families, and business owners who want to maintain pristine spaces without the stress.

From KES 3,000/month
